user.title: Automation Suggestions
user.description: Configure the Automation Suggestions integration to analyze your manual actions and suggest automations.

data_description.analysis_interval: How often to scan your logbook for patterns. Lower values find patterns faster but use more resources.
data_description.lookback_days: How many days of history to analyze. More days = better pattern detection, but slower analysis.
data_description.min_occurrences: How many times you must repeat an action before it's suggested as an automation. Lower values suggest more automations.
data_description.consistency_threshold: How consistent the timing must be (0.7 = 70%). Higher values only suggest actions you do at very regular times.
